name: vega-lite-shorthand

scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs vega-lite-shorthand.js -cm --source-map vega-lite-shorthand.min.js.map > vega-lite-shorthand.min.js && npm run schema
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm test && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rm -f vega-lite.* & find src -name '*.js*' -type f -delete & find test -name '*.js*' -type f -delete
scripts.lint: tslint -c tslint.json src/*.ts test/*.ts src/**/*.ts test/**/*.ts
scripts.watch:build: watchify src/vls.ts -p tsify -v -d -s vls -o 'exorcist vega-lite-shorthand.js.map > vega-lite-shorthand.js'
scripts.watch: nodemon -x 'npm run build && npm test && npm run lint'

author: Kanit Wongsuphasawat, Dominik Moritz, Jeffrey Heer
